name: Jiara
description:
Jiara

In Jiara you play a humanoid moth who has to make his way through the swamp. Bring all the artefacts to the altar of the swamp goddess Jiara and ensure the safety of your folk.

Beware of carnivorous plants, poisonous mist and the swamp water. Until Jiara is appeased, the swamp is not a safe place.

...

Enjoy the game:)

WASD - Move

Esc - Pause

Space - Jump
